TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program 2 (not dying and getting a new owner) Hype Train.

Articles.Content:
2 hours ago, Ellie-Gator said:

I'm really excited for KSP 2. I play on console so I cant play the EA. I'm guessing that KSP 2 will release on console at probably the same time as the 1.0 comes out and the EA ends, but thats an assumption and I don't actually know if thats true. What information do we have about the console release? Do we have any idea when it's coming? I wasn't really able to find any solid info which is why I made this account to ask.

as a side question, If it is coming at the same time as the EA ends, how long might that take?

All your answers are in FAQ

 

Edited June 7, 2023 by The Aziz

43 minutes ago, The Aziz said:

All your answers are in FAQ

Thank you! So I found a few things, it's a lil bit sad

"Console versions will come out as soon as possible after the completion of the Early Access period. "

So KSP 2 won't come out on console until AFTER the 1.0 release, not simultaneously.  Thats really sad since the game will probably be in early access for like, two years at a minimum. Looks like I won't get to play KSP 2 for... well, a really long time. I'm still excited, but this had made me a lil bit sad, ngl. I remember one of my friends telling me about KSP 2's announcement for a 2020 release date, and how it would come out on console, I was so excited! Now, I may not get to enjoy console KSP 2 until 2025 at the earliest.

When that day comes though, I will be excited  

Back to waiting with the KSP 1 Enhanced Edition. I'm gonna send a hype train to Eeloo.
Well, you will if you happen to own the current gen console.

On 6/24/2023 at 5:24 AM, Vl3d said:

Hello team! Any new content from release until now that I should discover in the game? Any extra reasons to play it again now?

They squashed a bunch of bugs, made a lot of optimizations, added some UI stuff, and added some parts.  Even those of us who are less than joyfully effusive about the game have found things to effuse less joyfully about so there are some fresh complaints that haven’t been done to death.  The improvement is very noticeable.
